name: N0mbers
description:
N0mbers is a puzzle game for both young and old.

A level contains 16 blocks of numbers. You must 'eat' all numbers until they're all zero.

The game uses basic subtraction to solve problems.

Simply swipe to rotate the blocks to change the number's order, release to eat adjacent numbers.

Find the right blocks to eat them without leaving a block alone.

Please consider a donation if you wish to help indie developers and my future projects.
